text: Grusonia is a genus of opuntioid cacti (family Cactaceae), originating from the North American Deserts in Southwest United States and northern Mexico, including Baja California. Authors differ on precise boundaries of the genus, which has been included in Cylindropuntia., pp. 342–343 Species include: * Grusonia aggeria (Ralston & Hilsenb.)
